import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Rate, Avatar, Badge, Tag, Form as AntdForm, Input as AntdInput, Select as AntdSelect } from 'antd'; import { UserOutlined, StarOutlined, ShoppingCartOutlined, HeartOutlined, EyeOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
